snippet: A son of the entertainer Johnny Carson was killed last Friday when his car went off a rural road and fell 100 feet down an embankment, the authorities said Monday.    The 39-year-old victim, Richard Wolcott Carson, was thrown from his four-wheel-d...
lead_paragraph: A son of the entertainer Johnny Carson was killed last Friday when his car went off a rural road and fell 100 feet down an embankment, the authorities said Monday. The 39-year-old victim, Richard Wolcott Carson, was thrown from his four-wheel-drive vehicle, which then landed on its top in a culvert, said Russ Johnson of the California Highway Patrol. Mr. Johnson said Mr. Carson had been killed instantly.

headline.main: Johnny Carson's Son Dies in an Auto Crash
